content.raw:
Proposed changes to test for DART using direct solver, not suitable for split impulse (position error correction via projection) due to potential impact on performance:

 * allow normal velocity after impact to be less than `max_vel` or max velocity allowed by position error correction.
 * allow position error to be corrected slowly if position projection error correction is not used.
 * change 'radius' [here](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/e510a6adbdc4f92f2a615a3a9fd5068abc4fd80f/test/integration/physics.cc?at=default#cl-567) to use "distance from center of mass to contact point'.
content.html:
Proposed changes to test for DART using direct solver, not suitable for split impulse (position error correction via projection) due to potential impact on performance:

  • allow normal velocity after impact to be less than max_vel or max velocity allowed by position error correction.
  • allow position error to be corrected slowly if position projection error correction is not used.
  • change 'radius' here to use "distance from center of mass to contact point'.
